Assaad Bouab (Arabic, a mụrụ na Julaị 31, 1980) bụ onye France-Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na Whatever Lola Wants, nke Nabil Ayouch duziri na Laura Ramsey dịka Lola
Ihe nkiri ahụ malitere na 11 Disemba afọ 2007 na Dubai International Film Festival
Bouab gara Cours Florent site n'afọ 1999 ruo 2002, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na CNSAD na Paris n'afọ 2006
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ mgbe niile na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn French a na-enye onyinye na nke a ma ama Call My Agent!.
